r.s: The UNL HTML Templates as a PEAR Package.
r.d: This package allows you to render UNL Template styled pages using PHP Objects.
r.n:
Finalize support for version 4.0 of the templates
Templates Supported: * Fixed * Debug * Unlaffiliate * Unlaffiliate_debug * Unlaffiliate_local
Fixed in this RC: * Use local .tpl files instead of always pulling remotely * Make HTML and DEP replacements when local files do not exist
